description.en: The charismatic and accomplished archduke of Jeuno、 the city-state connecting Vana'diel's east and west. By organizing the realm's adventurers、 he speedily thwarted the Shadow Lord's return. As one of the ancient race of Zilart seeking to open the Gate of the Gods、 however、 he would eventually be forced to cross swords with the adventurers who once aided him.
description.jp:
東西交通の要衝ジュノ大公国の首長で
数々の功績を打ち立てたカリスマ。
闇の王の復活に際して 冒険者を通じ
いち早く対処を開始した。
しかし その正体は遥か昔に滅びた
「ジラート文明」の末裔で永遠の楽園
「真世界」を取り戻すべく冒険者たち
の前に立ちはだかった。

jp.text: 私がジュノ大公 カムラナートだ
伝説の真世界はよみがえるのだ
なぜ私が倒れるのを黙って見ている！？
皆みな 大儀であった！
オ前 カラ 与エヨウ ！！！

gl.text: I am Kam'lanaut、 Archduke of Jeuno.
Why... What did I do to deserve...this...

name.jp: コールアビリティ_カムラナート

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Esoteric Region (C)]:
• Moderately raises BRV gain based on Attack
• BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Slightly improves special effects
rank_up_desc.jp:
「エソテリック・リージョン【C】」使用時
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・使用後特殊効果の効果小アップ

name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_カムラナート

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Light Blade (C)]
• Becomes 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
　Increases own BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
　+ 5-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Call Effect +20%
rank_up_desc.jp:
「光輪剣」使用時
・8HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃が
　3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる
　＋5HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・使用後特殊効果の効果小アップ

name.jp: エソテリック・リージョン

desc.en:
Raises BRV based on Attack
Grants 1 stack of [Esoteric Region] for 6 turns (5 stacks max)

When [Esoteric Region] is at 5 stacks:
• Removes [Esoteric Region]
• Grants [Desire of Provenance] for 4 turns

When [Genesaic Impetus] is active:
• Becomes [Esoteric Region+]
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ Grants [Desire of Provenance] for 4 turns

When [Esoteric Region] or [Desire of Provenance] is active:
• Inflicts [Addle] on target for 1 turn after receiving an enemy attack

[Desire of Provenance] lowers enemy Attack and Magical Attack
※Effect is removed when broken
[Addle] lowers Attack and Magical Attack
desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Self: 6 turns 1 level of Esoteric Region buff (limit 5)
With 5 levels of Esoteric Region buff active upon use:
 • Cancels Esoteric Region buff
 • Self: 4 turns Desire of Provenance
Becomes Esoteric Region+ while Desire of Provenance active
When hit with any BRV attack or HP attack while Esoteric Region or Desire of Provenance active:
 • Target: 1 turn Addle
desc.jp:
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算し
6ACTION強化効果「エソテリック・リージョン」1段階付与（上限5）
使用時 強化効果「エソテリック・リージョン」5段階が
付与されている場合
強化効果「エソテリック・リージョン」解除し
自身に4ACTION「創世の本懐」付与
「創世の本懐」付与中
「エソテリック・リージョン＋」に変化
強化効果「エソテリック・リージョン」または「創世の本懐」付与中
BRV攻撃またはHP攻撃を受けた時
攻撃をした対象に3ACTION「魔攻破壊」付与

desc.en:
2-HIT AoE melee BRV Attack + AoE HP Attack
Moderately increases BRV damage dealt to a single target
Deals 100% HP damage to all targets
Grants [Ducal Charisma] for 8 turns
Grants 2 additional stacks of [Esoteric Region]

When [Esoteric Region] is at 5 stacks:
• Removes [Esoteric Region]
• Grants [Desire of Provenance] for 6 turns

When [Desire of Provenance] is active:
• [Great Wheel] becomes [Great Wheel+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 4
　∟ Tremendously increases total BRV potency

[Ducal Charisma] raises party Max BRV and Attack
desc.gl:
2-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals total HP damage to each target
Self: 8 turns Ducal Charisma, 2 levels of Esoteric Region buff (limit 5)
With 5 levels of Esoteric Region buff active upon use:
 • Cancels Esoteric Region buff
 • Self: 6 turns Desire of Provenance
Becomes Great Wheel+ while Desire of Provenance active
When hit with any BRV attack or HP attack while Esoteric Region or Desire of Provenance active:
 • Target: 1 turn Addle
desc.jp:
2HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
与えるHPダメージは等倍

強化効果「エソテリック・リージョン」2段階付与（上限5）

desc.en:
8-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Self: Removes [Esoteric Region]; 6 turns [Desire of Provenance], 4 turns [Peerless Hero]
Does not consume ability uses on next turn (excl. some abilities)

When special effect [Peerless Hero] is active
• After HP attacks, restores BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt (only once per turn)
• Raises own Attack by 20%
• Raises party's stolen BRV overflow limit by 20%
• At start of each ally's turn, raises their BRV by 10% of their Max BRV
desc.jp:
8HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する

ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ

自身がHP攻撃後 与えた合計HPダメージの30％分
自身のBRVをアップさせる （1回の行動で1回のみ）
自身の攻撃力が小アップ
味方全員の奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
味方の行動開始時それぞれの最大BRVに依存した量のBRV加算
同名の特殊効果は重複しない

When called for assistance, Kam'lanaut performs the following actions:
• Moderately raises own Max BRV, Attack
• Raises BRV based on Attack
• 4-HIT Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack
• Raises caller's BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt

6 turns special effect after use:
• All targets: [S Attack Down], [S Magical Attack Down]
desc.jp:
コールされたカムラナートが以下の行動を行う

- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Extends duration of 「Wisdom of the Zilart」 by 3 turns

When using 「Glacification」:

- Moderately increases total BRV potency

name.jp: エソテリック・リージョンエクステンド

desc.en:
When using 「Esoteric Region」:
- Moderately raises BRV gain based on Attack
- Triggers a 2-HIT Ice melee BRV Attack + HP Attack after use
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Raises BRV based on 20% of HP damage dealt

When using 「Esoteric Region+」:
- Moderately raises BRV gain based on Attack
- Triggers a 4-HIT Ice melee BRV Attack + HP Attack after use
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
- Raises BRV based on 30% of HP damage dealt

When 「Esoteric Region」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ 2-HIT Ice melee BRV Attack
　∟ Moderately increases total BRV potency
　∟ Grants 1 additional stack of 「Esoteric Region」
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+」
　∟ 2-HIT Ice melee BRV Attack + HP Attack
　∟ Grants 1 additional stack of 「Esoteric Region」

When 「Desire of Provenance」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack++」
　∟ 4-HIT Ice melee BRV Attack
　∟ Tremendously increases total BRV potency
　∟ When breaking a target or attacking a broken target, turns 「Glacification」 into 「Glacification+」
   ・ Moderately increases total BRV potency
   ・ Moderately raises success rate of 「Paralysis」
   ・ Turns into 「Glacification」 after use if conditions are met, otherwise turns into 「Frost Blade」
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack++」
　∟ 2-HIT Ice melee BRV Attack + HP Attack triggered twice
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

While Esoteric Region buff active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit Ice melee BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increases active Esoteric Region buff level by 1)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack; increases active Esoteric Region buff level by 1)

While Desire of Provenance active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack++ (4-hit Ice melee BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; Glacification becomes Glacification+ [moderate BRV damage boost; moderate Paralyze hit rate boost; returns to Glacification after use if conditions to become Glacification are met; returns to Frost Blade if not] after inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack++ (2-hit Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)

name.jp: 断罪の光輪剣エクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Light Blade]
• Becomes 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
　Increases own BRV by 20％ of HP damage dealt
　+ 5-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
• Increases BRV potency by 80％
• All enemies: 3 turns [Addle]
• Special Effect [Peerless Hero] duration +4
• [ATK Up] effect of Special Effect [Peerless Hero] extended to party
• [Glacification] becomes [Glacification+] upon inflicting BREAK or attacking a broken target

When using [BRV Attack+++]
• Reduces target's BRV by 1/2 before BRV attacks
• Extends own buffs by 1 turn
desc.jp:
「光輪剣」使用時
・8HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃が
　3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる
　＋5HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・敵全体に3ACTION「魔攻破壊」付与
・特殊効果「絶世の英傑」の4ACTION期間延長
・特殊効果「絶世の英傑」の攻撃力アップの効果が味方全体化
・対象ブレイク後 ブレイク中攻撃後
　「氷魔剣」が以下の「氷魔剣＋」に変化
　　-BRV威力中アップ
　　-「マヒ」の付与率中アップ
　　-使用後「氷魔剣」への変化条件を満たしている場合は
　　 「氷魔剣」に そうでない場合は「氷神剣」に戻る

「BRV攻撃＋＋＋」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に対象のBRVを1/2にする
・自身に付与された強化効果を1ACTION延長する

short_desc.jp: 断罪の光輪剣エクステンド：「光輪剣」の性能アップ
